4600.name: Greater Dye of WIT (Wit+2 Men-2)
4600.description: Greater Dye of WIT <Wit+2 Men-2>. Collect and take 10 units of this type of magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities tattooed onto your body. Can be used by the Wizard class and the Healer class after completion of their second class transfer, and can be kept and used after the completion of the third class transfer as well.

4629.name: Red Soul Crystal
4629.description: A red crystal that absorbs souls. Once saturated it bestows special abilities to a weapon. 26 MP is consumed each time it is used. Soul Crystal

4630.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 1
4630.description: A red crystal that absorbs souls, stage 1. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. 26 MP is consumed each time it is used. Soul Crystal

4639.name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 10
4639.description: A red crystal that absorbs souls, stage 10. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it can absorb souls independently. No targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

4661.name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 10
4661.description: A blue crystal that absorbs souls, stage 10. Once saturated, it bestows special abilities to a weapon. Each use consumes 26 MP. Once a soul stone reaches this stage, it automatically absorbs souls. Therefore, no targeting is necessary. Soul Crystal

4662.name: Broken Red Soul Crystal
4662.description: A red-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal imbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless.

4663.name: Broken Green Soul Crystal
4663.description: A green-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal imbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless.

4664.name: Broken Blue Soul Crystal
4664.description: A blue-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal imbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless.

4665.name: Pipette Knife
4665.description: An instrument used to collect the blood of living creatures. Use it to cut Baium and obtain a blood sample.

4666.name: Reiria's Soul Orb
4666.description: A sphere containing Reiria's Soul. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

4667.name: Kernon's Infernium Scepter
4667.description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from the demon Kernon. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

4668.name: Golkonda's Infernium Scepter
4668.description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from Golkonda, the Longhorn General. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

4669.name: Hallate's Infernium Scepter
4669.description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from the Death Lord Hallate. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

4670.name: Maestro Reorin's Hammer
4670.description: A hammer used by a blacksmith. It is made by processing an adamantite nugget of high purity. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

4671.name: Maestro Reorin's Mold
4671.description: A mold used by Dwarven Artisans to manufacture top grade equipment. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

4672.name: Infernium Varnish
4672.description: Varnish used when manufacturing an infernium weapon. Take it to Maestro Reorin.

4673.name: Red Pipette Knife
4673.description: Pipette knife that holds Baium's blood. Bring it to Magister Casper at Hardin's Academy.

4677.name: Potion of Critical Escape
4677.description: Misdirects enemy attack, inhibits speed of user. Potion of Critical Escape

4678.name: Decrease Haste Potion
4678.description: Decreases one's level of Aggression. Decrease Hate Scroll

4679.name: Bless of Eva
4679.description: Allows one to breathe under water for extended periods. Bless of Eva

4680.name: Potion of Revenge
4680.description: Reduces P. Def. and reflects damage back upon enemy. Potion of Revenge

4681.name: Stormbringer - Critical Anger
4681.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases player's HP by 12 while increasing P. Atk. by 248 on a critical attack. Special Ability: Critical Anger

4682.name: Stormbringer - Focus
4682.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 86. Special Ability: Focus

4683.name: Stormbringer - Light
4683.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Special Ability: Light

4684.name: Shamshir - Guidance
4684.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Accuracy by 6. Special Ability: Guidance

4685.name: Shamshir - Back Blow
4685.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 67 when attacking the enemy from behind. Special Ability: Back Blow

4686.name: Shamshir - Rsk. Evasion
4686.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Evasion by 7 when HP drops to 60% or lower. Special Ability: Rsk. Evasion

4687.name: Katana - Focus
4687.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 82. Special Ability: Focus

4688.name: Katana - Critical Damage
4688.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 194 on a critical attack. Special Ability: Critical Damage

4689.name: Katana - Haste
4689.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 7%. Special Ability: Haste

4690.name: Spirit Sword - Critical Damage
4690.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 194 on a critical attack. Special Ability: Critical Damage

4691.name: Spirit Sword - Critical Poison
4691.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Poisons the target with a 15% chance during a general critical attack.

4692.name: Spirit Sword - Haste
4692.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 7%. Special Ability: Haste

4693.name: Raid Sword - Focus
4693.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 82. Special Ability: Focus

4694.name: Raid Sword - Critical Drain
4694.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Absorbs 9 HP from target during a critical attack.

4695.name: Raid Sword - Critical Poison
4695.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Poisons the target with a 15% chance during a general critical attack.

4696.name: Caliburs - Guidance
4696.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Accuracy by 5. Special Ability: Guidance

4697.name: Caliburs - Focus
4697.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 77. Special Ability: Focus

4698.name: Caliburs - Critical Damage
4698.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases P. Atk. by 213 on a critical attack. Special Ability: Critical Damage

4699.name: Sword of Delusion - Focus
4699.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 77. Special Ability: Focus
